# Read copilot-instructions.md

Please read the `copilot-instructions.md` file and the files linking from here. These files contain important instructions and guidelines for using GitHub Copilot effectively in this codebase. Make sure to follow the instructions outlined in the files to ensure a smooth and efficient coding experience with Copilot.

Read the contents and remember them. Do not do anything else yet.
